lead_paragraph: Eleven Greek weight lifters have been suspended for two years after testing positive for the banned steroid methyltrienolone. The International Weightlifting Federation said that Greece would still be able to send a team of four weight lifters — three men and a woman — to the Beijing Olympics. Eleven of the team’s 14 lifters tested positive during an out-of-competition test in March in Athens. The athletes have not been named.
